summary: The implementation is comprehensive and aligns well with the BuildRequest. All 12 requirements (REQ-1 through REQ-12) have been implemented with backend logic in Motoko (main.mo) and frontend components in React with TypeScript. The backend includes proper data models, rounding logic, calculations, CRUD operations, and stable storage. The frontend provides input forms, entry lists, delete functionality, grand totals display, and a professional wood-inspired design. No missing requirements or hallucinated features were identified.
